page.title: 02Education Long Marton
page.content: The school is a modern building even though it was built seventeen years ago.There are three teachers,three classes and sixty children (4-11yrs). There are two cooks,a care taker,a lunch-time assistant,a welfare assistant and a school secretary come for four hours a week. There is plenty of working room inside and outside space for football, netball,cricket,rounders,athletics and general play. In school we study English,Maths, Geography,History,Science,RI,Art/Craft ,Music,Drama,Gymnastics.We also work on topics and Enviromental Studies. Lots of mothers and the rector come to help at school each week and other local people share their special knowledge with us. We have one computer for all children in the school.
